attributes.action: A bonus to front line staff dealing with COVID 19 irrespective of sector.
attributes.additional_details: Front line staff in hospitals and NHS settings and staff in the private and voluntary sector in care homes and nursing homes put their own health and those of their families at risk for all of us. Many people and businesses will struggle in the aftermath. The Government is in a unique position to ensure that businesses and individuals who have made less of a contribution in proportion to their wealth have the opportunity to show their appreciation to front line workers who benefit us all.
attributes.background: The Government should take action to wholly fund the bonus proactively from Bankers Bonuses and from tax avoidance schemes. This is important given the sacrifices most individuals and businesses have made to support the Governments' strategy.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions: 

Pay bonus to all key workers: 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307215 

Identify and reward all key workers due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308903 

Consider how to compensate key workers for their efforts during Covid-19 crisis: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308172 

Make hazard pay mandatory for key workers in the midst of COVID 19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307619 

Give all key workers a 100% tax and Nat. Ins. holiday through COVID-19 crisis: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845
